name: freeCulture
notification: We have discovered cultural artifacts in the camp! (+20 culture)

uniques: Free [Civilian Convoy] found in the ruins

name: freeXP
notification: The survivors trained us in their ways of combat!

name: freePop
notification: We have found survivors in the camp! Population added to [cityName].

name: freeGold
notification: We have found a stash of [goldAmount] water in the camp!

name: freeAncientTech
notification: We have discovered the lost technology of [techName] in the camp!
uniques: [1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Decivilized era]

name: unitUpgrade
notification: Our unit finds advanced weaponry hidden in the camp!
uniques: This Unit upgrades for free including special upgrades

name: barbCampsRevealed
notification: You find evidence of Barbarian activity. Nearby Barbarian camps are revealed!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [Barbarian encampment] within a [10] tile radius

name: crudelyDrawnMap
notification: The camp contains maps of the nearby area!
uniques: From a randomly chosen tile [4] tiles away, reveal tiles up to [4] tiles away with [80]% chance

name: holySymbols
notification: We have found religious texts in the camp, giving us a deeper understanding of religion! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon

name: prophecy
